TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/CheckedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 表示包含列表视图控件中已选中项的索引的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection containing the indexes to the checked items in a list view control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A存储中已选中项的索引控件。A stores the indexes to the checked items in a control. 可以检查项，仅当属性控件设置为`true`。Items can be checked only if the property of the control is set to `true`. 中存储的索引是内的索引位置。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the . 存储中显示的所有项目控件。The stores all items displayed in the control. 下表演示了如何中存储的项示例在其选中状态以及控件。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their checked states in an example control. |索引Index|项Item|检查在列表视图中的状态Checked state in the ListView| |-----------|----------|-----------------------------------| |00|item1Item1|未选中状态Unchecked| |11|Item2Item2|已选中Checked| |22|Item3Item3|未选中状态Unchecked| |33|Item4Item4|已选中Checked| |44|Item5Item5|已选中Checked| 基于上表中的示例中下, 表说明了如何将出现。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |索引Index|ListViewItemCollection 中选中项的索引Index of checked item in ListViewItemCollection| |-----------|-----------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 可以使用的属性和方法的此类来执行各种任务的集合。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 方法使您能够确定是否从索引位置是存储在索引之一。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道该项目集合中，你可以使用方法来确定中的索引位置。Once you know that the item is in the collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你无法创建此类的实例，而无需将其与控件。You cannot create an instance of this class without associating it with a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使您能够确定是否从索引位置是选中的索引存储在之一。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the is one of the checked indexes stored in the . 一旦你知道某个项是选中的索引集合中，你可以使用方法来确定中的索引位置。Once you know that an item is in the checked index collection, you can use the method to determine the position of the index in the .

The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够确定中的选定项的数目。This property enables you to determine the number of checked items in the . 然后，循环访问集合的值和需要提供要执行循环的迭代次数时，可以使用此值。You can then use this value when you are looping through the values of the collection and need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性始终是`true`为此集合。This property is always `true` for this collection. 集合中的项只能通过修改控件。The items in the collection can only be modified by the control.
